name: Place of meeting
text: §467-6  Place of meeting.  The director of commerce and consumer affairs shall provide suitable quarters for meetings of the real estate commission and for the transaction of its other business. [L 1933, c 140, §5; RL 1935, §7314; am L 1935, c 126, §1; RL 1945, §7735; RL 1955, §170-5; am L Sp 1959 2d, c 1, §6; am L 1963, c 114, §3; HRS §467-6; am L 1982, c 204, §8; am L 1983, c 124, §17]
